sections.text: storage, defined.Electronic storage means:(1) Any temporary, intermediate storage of a wire or electronic communication incidental to the electronic transmission thereof; and(2) Any storage of such communication by an electronic communication service for purposes of backup protection of such communication.SourceLaws 2002, LB 1105, ยง 141.

86-279.Electronic storage, defined.

Electronic storage means:

(1) Any temporary, intermediate storage of a wire or electronic communication incidental to the electronic transmission thereof; and

(2) Any storage of such communication by an electronic communication service for purposes of backup protection of such communication.

SourceLaws 2002, LB 1105, ยง 141.
